TopicTitle: [Request] RPM map that follows Trajectories path

Articles.Content: Would anyone be up to (or does such a mod already exist?) create a mod to RPM's navmap display (https://www.dropbox.com/s/mfpkjm2ypf9d441/monitor2020-03-08_14-27-22_-5118738_14.png?dl=0) to have the flight path reflect the one generated by Trajectories using that mod's API?
